title: Supreme Immortal System - Novel Updates
tags: Aggressive Characters   Alchemy   Aristocracy   Artifact Crafting   Artifacts   Beasts   Body Tempering   Cheats   Cultivation   Fast Cultivation   Game Elements   Immortals   Magic   Magic Beasts   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Ruthless Protagonist   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Cloudy Skies   Tian Kong You Yun   天空有云
description:
You think you’re a big shot, don’t you? Have a look at my Tenfold Attack Card. 

Your cultivation realm is high? In that case, I have a Supreme Instakill Card. 

My Martial Arts and Martial Skills are lacking? Then I have a Supreme Fusion Card. 

Killing people casually, picking up girls, and taking in a couple of subordinates along the way. 

Watch as a young man from Earth after transmigrating, dominate the other world as an absolute tyrant. >
